attributes.action: Ask Eric Brunning to rejoin TOOT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TOOT (The Old Oak Tree) is a web site dedicated to former and serving soldiers of The Life Guards. It enables former colleagues to keep in touch in whatever part of the world they may be in, ensuring continuing support for one another.
Eric left the site for personal reasons. His former colleagues and friends miss him and his input, and would like him to return to the site.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
